casebody.data:
[Cite as 07/15/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-0hio-3717.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 15, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002- 2241. State v. Monroe.

Franklin C.P. No. 01CR042118. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution pending disposition of his appeal by this court,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of execution be, and hereby is, granted.
